Resolved Question Show me another » What jobs do illegal immigrants do that Americans won't? I stay out of here because of the unreasoning hatred that fills the topic. But I've come up with a few, and I wonder how many others you can think of.
Spraying herbicides and pesticides without protection. Demolition of old buildings filled with lead and asbestos, and carrying off the debris without a mask. Painting and sand blasting and other construction work without protection.
In fact, any job that it would be illegal to perform without OSHA-approved protection is commonly handed off to people who don't understand the language well enough to realize that they are putting their lives at risk. They aren't"real"people, are they? That seems to be the thinking, at any rate.
Any others? 6 years ago Report Abuse
Additional Details Lt. Harris, what color is the blood of foriegners? 6 years ago Ruby, in order to qualify for welfare, you are fingerprinted and your identity checked. While a very few illegals might sneak through, most who try would be deported. Illegals do NOT fill up the welfare rolls! 6 years ago katsu, my source is three guys who now work with my son. All three were once illegal, but are now legal, and making approximately 5 times more money.
My son did once happen to work in a slaughterhouse, though. I think he lasted three days. 6 years ago Jesi, Hooray for you! (I can't believe I'm saying this) Hooray for OSHA! As you can tell by reading some responses, many Americans are more than happy to employers kill off illegals. Hooray for anyone who saves another person's life! 6 years ago Davie, you wrote,"So they're putting legalized citizens in america in poverty. thanks to people like you."I am in no way responsible for the behavior of others! MY poverty was caused by 5 years of illness in my immediate family, and the poverty of the citizens I know mainly came from Mom being too poorly trained to support her children after a divorce. But even if illegals caused it, it sure as hell isn't my fault! I've NEVER hired an illegal (or a citizen, for that matter.) 6 years ago by Thoughts Like Mine Member since: 09 June 2006 Total points: 1,832 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker The illegal’s want the jobs that pay $5.15 and hour. They will even take them for less pay. It’s not the tasks or the job duties that are at issue in this question. It is the amount of money that these jobs pay. If picking tomatoes paid 100K a year, American college’s graduates would be clamoring to stand in the fields all day long. On the other hand, if the top pay for lawyers for $6.50 an hour, (with no over time) no one would touch that job.
We American are funny. We want our hamburgers to cost .99 cents. But the only way to achieve that is to pay the people who pick the lettuce and tomatoes slave wages. If we start paying American 50K a year to work in the slaughter houses, and 60K a year to pick vegetables, guess what your local burger is gonna cost.
If you are willing to pay 10.99 for that BIG MAC, then more power to you. You have the right to complain about the illegal alien problem.
But if you love the .99 cent menu at the local fast food restaurant then sit down and shut up and let the illegal immigrants do what they came here to do. 6 years ago Report Abuse
